name: Purr-anormal Cat-ivity
description:
Controls: Use the up and down arrow keys to control the ghost cat. Use Enter to confirm your selections in the menus. Press Escape to access the menu while in-game.

How to Play: The ghost cat's eyes will glow a certain color. Slamming into a fish with the same color will award you points, but you must avoid the other colors. For bonus points, you can risk getting close to the front and the back of the fish (you'll hear a "woosh" sound if you do it correctly).

Made in under 72hrs for Mini Jam 80: Cats with the Limitation: "8x8 Textures".

Okiix helped me out with some art during this jam, you can find her at https://itch.io/profile/okiix or https://twitter.com/okiiART

You can also follow me at https://twitter.com/dhafo_

Thanks for playing! Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
